de.javanarior.utils.compare

Interface SpeakingComparable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to compare
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpeakingComparableAdapter

    public interface SpeakingComparable<T>
extends Comparable<T>
    A more speaking Comparable interface. Usually the methods in this interface rely on Comparable#compareTo(Object).

    As mentioned in Comparable the compareTo and equals does not have strictly to be consistent ( (x.compareTo(y)==0) == (x.equals(y))), even it's recommend and should be noted. For this reason the equals method here is called equalsTo.
